BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CASA OF THE PIKES PEAK REGION

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: CASA OF THE PIKES PEAK REGION PROVIDES A VOLUNTEER'S VOICE IN COURT FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE VICTIMS OF ABUSE, NEGLECT OR DOMESTIC CONFLICT. SEE SCH O FOR CONTINUATION
IRS990.MissionDesc: CASA OF THE PIKES PEAK REGION PROVIDES A VOLUNTEER'S VOICE IN COURT FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE VICTIMS OF ABUSE, NEGLECT OR DOMESTIC CONFLICT AND PROMOTES COMMUNITY AWARENESS OF THESE ISSUES TO ENSURE SAFE AND PERMANENT HOMES
IRS990.Desc: CHILDREN'S ADVOCACY PROGRAM - PROVIDES A VOLUNTEER'S VOICE IN COURT FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE VICTIMS OF ABUSE, NEGLECT, OR DOMESTIC CONFLICT AND PROMOTES COMMUNITY AWARENESS OF THESE ISSUES TO ENSURE SAFE AND PERMANENT HOMES. SEE SCH O FOR CONTINUATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS HAVE BEEN ESTABLISHED IN ORDER TO SUPPORT PROGRAM COSTS IN FUTURE YEARS

CASA IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. IN ADDITION, CASA QUALIFIES FOR THE CHARITABLE CONTRIBUTION DEDUCTION AND HAS BEEN CLASSIFIED AS AN ORGANIZATION OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. CASA BELIEVES THAT IT DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. TAX YEARS THAT REMIAN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION INCLUDE 2014 THROUGH THE CURRENT PERIOD.
EVENT #1: 18TH ANNUAL LIGHT OF HOPE EVENT #2: 6TH ANNUAL LIGHT OF HOPE NORTH

Form 990 Part I Line 1: CASA OF THE PIKES PEAK REGION PROVIDES A VOLUNTEER'S VOICE IN COURT FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE VICTIMS OF ABUSE, NEGLECT OR DOMESTIC CONFLICT AND PROMOTES COMMUNITY AWARENESS OF THESE ISSUES TO ENSURE SAFE AND PERMANENT HOMES Form 990 Part III Line 4A: IN SUPPORT OF THESE ADVOCACY SERVICES, THE AGENCY ADMINISTERS SEVERAL PROGRAMS. SUPERVISED EXCHANGE AND PARENTING TIME PROGRAM (SEPT) IS A COURT-ORDERED SERVICE TO PROTECT CHILDREN FROM WITNESSING PARENTAL DISPUTES DURING WHICH EXCHANGE PROGRAM VOLUNTEERS OVERSEE THE TRANSFER OF CHILDREN FROM ONE PARENT TO ANOTHER IN CONFLICTIVE CUSTODY OR DOMESTIC VIOLENCE CASES. CHILDREN AND FAMILIES IN TRANSITION PROGRAM (CFIT) EDUCATES PARENTS ABOUT THE EFFECTS OF DIVORCE ON CHILDREN, THE LEGAL ASPECTS OF CUSTODY ARRANGEMENT, AND THE NEGATIVE EFFECTS OF PARENTAL CONFLICT ON CHILDREN. THE MILTON FOSTER CHILDREN'S FUND (MFCF) PROVIDES FOSTER CHILDREN WITH OPPORTUNITIES NOT FUNDED THROUGH OTHER AGENCIES. THESE NEEDS INCLUDED SCHOLARSHIPS FOR SPORTS AND RECREATION, SPECIALIZED EDUCATION AND UNMET NEEDS, AMONG OTHERS. The Hanger Project, a MFCF program, is a store with used clothing and accessories for adolescents in foster care. The adolescents may select five items per month. The teens also work in the store and learn job skills. CASA offers weekend classes on life skills and jobs/career building to strengthen their opportunities as they move toward adulthood. Form 990 Part VI Section B Line 11: AFTER THE ANNUAL AUDIT FOR THE FISCAL YEAR (JULY 1ST THROUGH JUNE 30TH) IS COMPLETED, THE FOLLOWING STEPS ARE TO BE TAKEN TO COMPLETE THE 990: FIRST DRAFT OF THE "990 ORGANIZER" FORM IS COMPLETED BY THE CONTRACT ACCOUNTANT WITH INPUT FROM KEY STAFF. THE ORGANIZER IS SENT TO THE AUDITOR TO PREPARE A DRAFT OF THE 990. THIS DRAFT OF THE 990 WILL THEN BE RETURND TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FOR FINAL REVIEW AND EDITS MADE WITH CPA, RDD AND OM. THE ABOVE 990 SECOND DRAFT IS SENT TO THE AUDITOR FOR FINAL REVIEW. THE 990 WILL BE PRESENTED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE BY THE AUDITOR. IF ANY CHANGES ARE RECOMMENDED, THEN IT WILL GO BACK TO THE AUDITOR FOR EDITS. THE 990, ALONG WITH THE AUDIT, WILL BE PRESENTED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE CHAIR TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR APPROVAL. THE 990 WILL BE SIGNED BY THE AUDITOR AND THEN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND FILED WITH IRS BY THE OM Form 990 Part VI Section B Line 12C: BOARD MEMBERS AND KEY STAFF SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, WHICH REMAINS ON RECORD. ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICTS ARE REVIEWED AND HANDLED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE Form 990 Part VI Section B Line 15: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S SALARY IS DETERMINED WITH COMPARISON TO ANNUAL, INDEPENDENT, AND STATE-WIDE NON-PROFIT SALARY STUDY AND IS ALSO BASED ON PERFORMANCE. PERFORMANCE IS BASED ON STRATEGICALLY SET OUTCOMES WITHIN AN ANNUAL SCORECARD VOTED ON BY THE BOARD. THE SALARY IS DELIBERATED AND DECIDED UPON BY THE BOARD CHAIR AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE Form 990 Part VI Section C Line 19: THE ORGANIZATION'S 990 AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE, ON GUIDESTAR, AND ALSO AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST
